content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belts at positions (x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using inserter entities without source items
- Ensure that inserter entities have source items before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the required ingredients before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that pipe groups have fluid before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using electricity groups without being plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when using belt groups without items
- Ensure that belt groups have items before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked. 
Important variables that have been assigned:
* entity positions (x, y)
* entity statuses (e.g. EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS)
